properties.name: HOME
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis1800 Lucretia Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90026This is where I live. It is a beautiful place that overlooks downtown LA. We live less than a mile from Dodger Stadium.

properties.name: IS 22
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis270 E. 167th St. Bronx, NY 10456The school where I worked for 5 years. Almost a 1,000 students. I had 33 in each of my classes. It was quite an adjustment to teach there. My students came from some pretty difficult family settings - single parents on welfare, foster homes, shelters, families in gangs. Education was not a priority for most.

properties.name: My dad's house
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis15446 Valley Vista Blvd, Sherman Oaks, CA 91403This is where my dad currently lives. He moved here when I was in the 11th grade. My room was above the garage, separate from the house. I lived like the Fonze.

properties.name: My dad's old house
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis5118 Goodland Ave. North Hollywood, CA 91607This is where my dad and step-mom lived from 1981-1991. It was close to my school. I remember my friends and I would go there during free periods and jump in the pool.

properties.name: Oakwood Apartments
properties.description: Posted by MfwillisThis is where my dad moved after my parents divorced. I was like a singles apartment complex where they had BBQs by the pool on Sundays. I was like 4 years old. I remember the gloomy hallways and yellow doors.

properties.name: Oakwood School
properties.description: Posted by MfwillisÂ 11600 Magnolia Blvd. North Hollywood, CA 91607My junior high and high school. It was one campus...an old apartment complex on one side and a church on the other. Ironic, because the majority of students were Jewish. We had a class of 50 or so students. It was a liberal private school where we called teachers by their first name and had town meeting twice a week.

properties.name: University of Pennsylvania
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis3400 Walnut Ave, Philadelphia, PA 19104This is where I went to college. The English Department and most of the English classes were held in this building - Bennett Hall.

properties.name: Where I am from.
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis11954 Iredell St. Studio City, CA 91604Beautiful Studio City, California. Just on the other side of the Hollywood Hills. I grew up here...spent the first 18 years of my life. We had a pool and a nice backyard with a basketball court. My brother and I even created a wiffle ball field where the roof was an automatic double and the BBQ was the foul line.

properties.name: Where I currently live
properties.description: Posted by Mfwillis1800 Lucretia Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90026Home for now. Zoe and I moved here from New York in 2004. We are now married and beautiful Kaiya has entered our lives. She was born March 1, 2007. Perhaps she\'ll be a Dodgers fan...we live a few blocks away from the stadium.
